ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the advertising account associated with the audience.

name.description: The name given to the audience for identification.

audience_type.description: Type of audience data, such as website visitors, customer list, lookalike audience, etc.

description.description: Detailed information about the audience criteria and characteristics.

rule.description: Contains information about the rule/condition applied to filter audiences.

country.description: The country criteria set for the audience.

customer_list_id.description: Identifier for the customer list used as a criterion for the audience.

engagement_domain.description: The domain(s) used for engagement tracking purposes.

engagement_type.description: The type of engagement tracked, such as clicks, likes, shares, etc.

percentage.description: Percentage of similarity for lookalike audience criteria.

prefill.description: Option to automatically fill in missing data for the audience.

retention_days.description: Number of days the audience data should be retained.

visitor_source_id.description: Identifier for the visitor source used as a criterion for the audience.

engager_type.description: Type of audience engagement, like active engagers, passive viewers, etc.

ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the advertising account linked to the audience criteria.

size.description: Estimated size of the audience based on the specified criteria.

status.description: Current status of the audience, like active, paused, deleted, etc.

type.description: Type of audience data, such as saved audience, custom audience, etc.

created_timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the audience was created.

updated_timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the audience data was last updated.
